parameters.name: options.name
parameters.description: The name of the database to open.

parameters.name: options.version
parameters.description: The version of the database schema. Triggers onUpgrade if higher than current.

parameters.name: options.onUpgrade
parameters.description: Callback to define or update the database schema (e.g., creating object stores).

returnValues.name: close
returnValues.description: Closes the active database connection and clears the internal reference.

returnValues.name: deleteDatabase
returnValues.description: Closes the connection and deletes the database from the browser.

returnValues.name: open
returnValues.description: Manually opens a connection to the database.

returnValues.name: withStore
returnValues.description: Wraps a function in a transaction, providing direct access to a specific object store.
